pages.text: For crafting fun waffles. $(br)$(br)Waffles are crafted from $(#cca549)$(l)raw waffle batter$(), a $(7)$(l)waffle mold$(), and an optional $(5)$(l)waffle filling$(). $(br)$(br)Timing is important! If a waffle is uncooked, it will be a $(#cca549)$(l)batter mess$(), but too long and it will be a $(0)$(l)burnt crisp$().

pages.title: Fillings
pages.text: Fillings add customizable flavor to a waffle. $(br)$(br)These include flavored creams, jams, custard, and tapioca pearls.
